phrases: A Super-Huge Genki Dama - I am Playing My Last Card!!
It is no good.
Not even with Goku's 20x Kaio-ken.
How can it be?
That did not have much effect on him at all!
He was not bluffing this time either!
H- He really has not been using any more than half of his power!
Ow, ow ow!
Where am I?
Let us see...
I was a frog, and the frog was me, and Kuririn was there...
Um, and Son-kun might have been there...
Enough!
What is taking Son-kun so long?
Just take care of those aliens, already!
This planet really is the worst!
I have found you!
This is your fault!
You will not get away with it!
Unbelievable!
Goku's Kamehame-Ha just now had incredible power!
Y- Yeah...
Why, then?
Why is it that Freeza has barely taken any damage, then?
Father's Ki has dropped considerably!
To think that a guy like that could exist in this world!
It is utterly lost.
It is just as Kaio said.
No matter what, we should have kept our hands off of Freeza.
T- That was a close one!
How!?
How does that lower life form Saiyan have such awesome power?
This is the first time anyone has done this much harm to my body!
You damn Saiyan!
That one... hurt.
It hurt!!
Father!
Monkey!
What happened to all that energy you had a moment ago?
K- Kaio-sama, what is happening?
He is being beaten!
Goku is taking a one-sided beating!
- H- He is what!? - H-
He cannot be!
F- Freeza is frighteningly strong.
That twenty-power Kaio-ken was beyond Goku's limits after all.
What is wrong?
Have you finally used up the last of your power?
How dull.
And here I thought I would found an opponent I could get somewhat serious over.
I really have lost a great deal of power.
Looks as though that 20x Kaio-ken had its price, all right.
Indeed, the Saiyans are a lower life form, whose only talent is in fighting.
Every last one of you are fools.
Killing you off was the right decision.
It is... all over...
Kakarrot, you disappoint me!
Is that the extent of your power?
Where has your Saiyan pride gone?
- I are not no Saiyan! - Are you still saying that!?
You are a Saiyan unlike any other!
Vegeta, none of that matters now.
Team up with me...
You are a Saiyan!
You have the fighting Saiyan people's blood flowing through you!
Do you not feel the anguish?
The man who destroyed Planet Vegeta,
the world where you and I were both born, is this same Freeza!
Does it not wound your pride as a Saiyan to be battered about by him!?
Saiyan... pride?
Your father, Burdock... as well as my father, King Vegeta...
Kakarrot, you are the last remaining Saiyan!
He wants to kill every last Saiyan.
This is because he fears the birth
of what is said to be the strongest warrior in the universe,
the legendary Super Saiyan!
If I could have, I would have killed him by my own hand.
And then I get killed like a rag doll!
If you understand my anguish,
then be sure to kill him by your hand!
I hate that sort of thing!
But I will not let you die easily.
I still want to have some fun, you see.
Vegeta, I was raised on Earth, so I do not know anything about being Saiyan.
But I can at least understand your grief!
You are talking nonsense again.
I must not lose.
I must not lose, not to the likes of Freeza!
Stop messing with me!
What!?
Do not fool...
Why, you!
That was kind of close just now!
Looks like you have got a bit of fight back in you.
But you Saiyans are still lower life forms.
I can read what you are going to do next as you attack.
You will forever be unable to beat me!
F- Father!
Looks like this is it.
You will be wanting to die pretty soon, right?
I will put you out of your misery right now!
What is that?
What is the matter?
It is Bubbles-kun!
It sounds like it came from the house!
- What is the matter, Bubbles?
- Gregory!
It looks like there is someone in there!
Yummy, yummy!
Who are you guys!?
ReaCoom!
Butta!
Jheese!
Ghurd!
Together we are...
The Ginyu Special Corps!
It is missing something, huh?
Maybe because the Commander is not here.
We have not done this in a while, either.
No, it has to be the gravity!
Okay, let us try it again!
Together we are...
The Ginyu Special Corps!
All right!
That one went well!
We nailed it!
Okay, from now on, that is how we will do it.
W- What is the deal... with these guys?
I cannot take it any more!
I am going!
W- Wait!
- How come?
Father will be killed!
- Goku is about to do something!
But what?
What can he hope to do with such little remaining power?
What is this?
What are you trying to do?
Ah!
A Genki Dama!
What?
A Genki Dama?
T- That is right.
The Genki Dama, a last-ditch technique he learned from Kaio-sama.
The foliage and animals on this planet, as well as ourselves, and even microorganisms...
He takes a fraction of the Genki, the basic energy of life, from every living thing, and apportions it to himself.
And then... and then he creates a ball of energy, and attacks with it!
What!?
Damn, Kaio.
You kept that back from us, did not you?
B- But will it work against Freeza?
There is a far smaller number of living things here than on Earth!
What choice is there!?
Goku has to realize that too!
Are you saying there is another option left!?
All we can do is gamble that this works!
I cannot beat Freeza with just the energy from this planet.
Those planets in Namek, I only need a little from each of you...
Share some of your Genki with me!
T- This Genki Dama is the last thing I wanted to use.
There will probably be too much force to it!
It will be hard not to squash the planet itself!
But if I do not wipe out Freeza here and now, the universe itself could be torn apart!
I do not know if this is going to go right or not, but it is all I can do now!
What is this you are doing?
You are still thinking of trying some kind of nonsense, are you?
What can you possibly do, as worn out as you are?
G- Goku...
Can you really beat Freeza with a Genki Dama?
W- What is this I am sensing?
l- It is...
G- Genki Dama...
l- It cannot be...!
A Genki Dama, loaded with the hopes of the universe.
Will this turn out to be Goku's very last card?
